Title: First-Year Portuguese I
Meeting Date: Meeting Date: Sep 09, 2020 to Dec 11, 2020 Days: Tue Thu Time: 18:05 - 19:55
Also Register In: Section Information:ONLINE course: A mixture of meetings/activities at which students are expected to be available during the scheduled time, and other activities outside this time. Must complete additional requirements to remain in the course. See the Modern Languages website, www.carleton.ca/slals/ for more information. For students learning the language for the 1st time. All others require placement (see previous link). If full, waitlists open on Carleton Central July 2. Precludes additional credit for PORT 1110.
